title: Millenium Actress anime by Satoshi Kon
description:
An anime directed by Satoshi Kon.


A great film, too.

The film is subtitled in English and French, despite what the torrent says. Trust me. 

Please seed when you're done, okay?



**No Malware Certified**



This torrent also uses IPv6. :)

PLEASE Note: If you like this movie, consider buying the actual DVD to support this great director!


Also Note: If you encounter an "unknown error" in Windows Media Player while viewing the film, just close it out and restart the movie from the point you left off.
